features: IMPRESSIVE VOLUME AND BASS - A106 mini speaker is conveniently small but able to releasing crystal clear sound with impressive bass and room-filling loudness through a high-performance driver and a passive subwoofer. Small, but such powerful Bluetooth speakers. Wireless streaming music or internet radio services such as Pandora and Spotify from your Smartphone, iPhone, or other audio device with Bluetooth.

EASY TO CARRY - weighing6.2 ounces and measuringΦ1.89*H1.54 inches, along with the speaker, you will get a metal hook and a carrying case which allows you to take your music on the go, and also protect your EWA A106 portable speaker from damage. So it is perfect for outdoor, hiking, beach, dorm room, kitchen, bathroom, boat, golf car and more.
LONG BATTERY LIFE - the built-in rechargeable battery guarantees 5 hours of play time, and up to 8 hours at 50% volume. Just half an hour of charge time with 1A charger equals 3 Hours of play time.

SIMPLE YET STYLISH DESIGN - our vision was to make a small wireless speakers with bluetooth that is just a speaker, so you can use it anytime, anywhere. We gave up functions such as a microphone, 3.5mm jack and unnecessary buttons, leaving one silicone button (Hold to switch on/ off, one-tap to pause, double-tap or triple-tap to switch songs), a perfect gift.

WHAT YOU GET - 1 EWA A106 Bluetooth speaker, 1 micro USB to USB charging cable, a user manual, 1 carrying case, 1 metal hook, 1-year warranty and a 30-day risk free guarantee. (If you're not completely thrilled with your A106, send it back for a full refund, no questions asked).
body.description: Simple, but packs a lot of punch. Play it loud! Thanks to the fully equipped custom-made high performance 3W neodymium driver, the EWA A106Pro is surprisingly loud with well-balanced sound, even louder than most of speakers which double its size. Play it easy. The only button on the speaker is the ON/ OFF button with LED indicator, which is also able to play/pause with 1X click, play the next track with 2 clicks and play the previous track with 3 clicks.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EWA A106Pro Super Mini Portable Bluetooth Speaker Egg-sized, delicate, premium and innovative. The EWA A106Pro Bluetooth speaker has been designed to fit in everywhere. About EWA Since 2011, the EWA brand was established by the spirits of "Beyond the Limits". As a designer and manufacturer, we focus on portable wireless speakers and earbuds, to develop premium and valuable products for people. We believe that the most important thing for audio products is the sound, which is why we spent so much time perfecting the sound quality of this stunning model. Never settle, we are always on the way to break the limits.

Small, Until You Hear it. Making Moments Special From the begining, we were thinking of making such a speaker: It should be small, so it can be taken and enjoyed anywhere. So, we defined the size as 1.89* 1.57'', just like an egg. It was originally packed with a hard EVA case to allow the speaker to play music when inside and to protect the speaker from scratches. It should be loud, beyond the limit of the size. So, we equipped the speaker with a custom-made, high performance 3W neodymium driver, which delivers a loud and balanced sound. It should have an incredible bass. Previously, the biggest pain point of small size speakers was the weakness of the bass performance. In such a tiny space, we needed to add the driver, the battery and all electronic components inside. Besides, through our innovative technology, the EWA A106Pro speaker was equipped with a passive radiator, which is why it released such amazing bass, this needed to fit too. It should be simple and delicate. People like something that is small and delicate, so we used metal materials, and followed a minimalism design. People do not like complicated technology, thus we gave up needless functions such as a 3.5mm AUX-in, NFC, microphone. And other buttons were also abandoned apart from just one, with an LED indicator. This is the EWA A106Pro, an unparalleled Mini Portable Bluetooth Speaker. We hope people love it and take it everywhere with them.

Simple, but packs a lot of punch. Play it loud! Thanks to the fully equipped custom-made high performance 3W neodymium driver, the EWA A106Pro is surprisingly loud with well-balanced sound, even louder than most of speakers which double its size. Play it easy. The only button on the speaker is the ON/ OFF button with LED indicator, which is also able to play/pause with 1X click, play the next track with 2 clicks and play the previous track with 3 clicks. Do you noticed? Super loud and easily to fill any room space. Delivers deep and comfortable bass. Well balanced sound, with less than 1% harmonic distortion. Easy to use, even on the go.

Wireless Connection Bluetooth Versions 5.0 The latest Bluetooth technologyDelivers an ultra-stable connectionStable connection up to 30 ft away State of the Art Craftsmanship We pushed the limits in the creation of A106Pro, leveraging unique manufacturing innovations to craft a speaker that delivers premium sound quality in a sleek and versatile body. Ready For Travel The A106Pro is so tiny that you can just slide it in to your hand bag or even pocket. With the packed original travel case, you can also hang it to your bag, bike or any other where. Always ready to go.

A106 Mini Bluetooth Speaker A110 Samll Bluetooth Speaker A109mini Wireless Speaker A119 Mini Bluetooth Speaker A106Max Loud Speaker Sound Loud Sound, Balanced Sound Profile Loud Sound, Balanced Sound Profile Loud Sound, Deeper Bass Loud Sound, Deeper Bass Huge Sound, Stronger Bass Water Resistance IPX67 — — IPX7 IPX5 Playtime(50% volume) 12 Hours 12 Hours 8 Hours 6 Hours 12 Hours Recommended Travel Shower Bathroom Hiking Boat Beach Camping Picnic Indoor Bedroom Living Room Travel Shower Bathroom 12 Hours

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional little gem, within realistic expectations…
reviews.reviewText: I have quite a few BT speakers for different needs, most of which are filled. But I saw this little thing and based on reviews, discounted price (about $22), and sheer curiosity I figured I have nothing to lose, and of course Amazon’s easy returns.First, it’s indeed a keeper. 1. Great price. 2. Very high quality and sturdy feeling build. 3. So small you can literally take it anywhere in a pocket. 4. Dead Cheap. Skip 2 of your fancy morning coffees…It does get shockingly loud, it’s unbelievable so much sound comes from something so small. It remains clear even at upper volumes, but the the bass does get overpowered by the highs the louder you go, like most small speakers. It will indeed light up a small room!The “keep your expectations realistic” part of the review. The bass… it is there, and for a micro speaker pretty good, but physics… Bass requires pushing around a lot of air, and that needs size, plain and simple. This isn’t gonna shake your fillings loose, the end.Also, you are asking one litte mono pod speaker to do a lot, so when listening to complex, multi layered music, you do not get the separation and clarity you would out of a multi-speaker unit. It can get a little muddled, again this is unavoidable, and very picky.Overall, it is a great litte buy. Beautiful and if it lasts, quality little speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Bluetooth Speaker on the Go
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this little speaker! I love quick charging, the small size that allows you to stick it in your pocket, the great loud sound quality, and how easy it is to use and connect via Bluetooth! I originally bought it for a prank with a coworker at work. After that, I have decided to use it everywhere I go instead of using my phone speaker. I wouldn't say the speaker is heavy, but it definitely isn't as light as I figured it would be due to its size. It is still light enough for me to stick it in my pocket or mini purse and take with me anywhere. I would recommend this to anyone and I would buy this again for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing sound in a tiny package!
reviews.reviewText: Usually speakers this small do not sound good. I own 3 bluetooth speakers of varying sizes bought over 9 years. The EWA speaker sounds very good for its tiny size. It has decent bass and hits the mid-range and high notes with great clarity. This thing is small enough to easily fit in my pocket, purse, beach bag or even in the cupholder in a car. You can feel the little speaker pulsing with the beats. While something this tiny will never have as much deep bass as much larger, dual speaker cone models, this is a winner for size and ease of use.It appears to be well-made, came very nicely packaged with a short usb-c charging cable (same as my phone so very convenient on the go) and it's really simple to use - just one button does it all and since that button lights up - it's really easy to use at night. My other small bluetooth speaker has tiny buttons you can't see in the dark and are hard to touch because they are under the housing a bit. The weight of this EWA speaker makes it feel like a quality device. Pairing was quick and easy with my Galaxy S21+. The travel case and ring that came packaged with it are really nice to have so you can clip this to a backpack, bike, your beltloop or hang it on a tree, beach umbrella or whatever.All-around impressive little speaker for the price and size. I purchased this for use on vacation so I was looking for something that was waterproof and small enough to pack in my electronics gear case with my cords and chargers.Bonus bit of info - if you have a USB-C to USB-C phone cable, you can charge this little speaker right from your phone for extended play time. You can also play it while it's connected by USB to your phone for charging. Playback only works if the speaker has some charge on it first - if it's totally dead, allow about 15 minutes of charging to happen before playing to it while charging with your phone. The speaker has a 700 mAh battery so it only takes about 2 hours to charge from zero, but if playing while it's charging that charge time will be a bit longer - in my test it took 2.5 hours to charge while being used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Little speaker that sounds great
reviews.reviewText: I love this speaker; it's inexpensive, and suits my needs pretty well. Definitely use it in the case for the best sound. The sound does not distort at high volume, the bass is strong, and it's sturdy (I have dropped it a few times with, and without, the case-no damage). I use it primarily for personal listening of all types of soft and loud music, and podcasts. The battery lasts more than long enough for several hours on medium to high volume. It only falls short of 5 stars for two reasons: a. you can only control the volume from your phone; b. they cannot be paired. But I love it and I bought one for my mom after she was smitten with mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little speaker! A powerhouse for sound. Very solid feel, heavy. Nice carrying case to hook on a bag or anything else easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What an exceptional little speaker at a good price I mean I was blown away at the decent sound even inside the carry case. I just clip it to my gear stick in car and it fits great and sounds awesome. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big sound, works great!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased 4 months ago. Use it every day outside in my jacuzzi. it gets wet almost everyday and keeps working. big, clear sound, simple to use and pair with my iPhone. Charges fast and the charge lasts a long time. Never ran out of juice. You should buy one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: I bought this device for travel as I have a larger by another Amazon vendor. This device is small yet provides a good sound.If in a hotel room and want to play some music..you're all set..How ever don't let the size fool you..You can pop on your pocket and have background music wherever you go.Syncs nicely to my phone. The rose gold is very attractive.
Práctica y funcional, el sonido es decente y viene en una funda muy mona 😁
Pelo tamanho da caixa (bem pequena) o som eh ótimo, claro e um razoável grave.Feliz com a compra.
Per le sue dimensioni ridotte lo porti ovunque . Ottima fattura e suono

Prima und leistungsstarkes, kleines Teil.Ist mein erster, hab ihn während des Umzugs genutzt, um vom Handy Musik zu hören.Auch jetzt benutze ich ihn, wenn ich mal übers Laptop einen Film gucken. Toll, auch ein super Preis.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was a christmas gift to a 21 year old male, he loved it, he said the base and overall sound for such a tiny speaker was perfect.
